title: Security Posture Improvement Task Force
objective: To create a dedicated task force that assesses and enhances the security posture of vulnerable sectors, focusing on education and healthcare institutions to mitigate ransomware threats.
timeline_phases: Phase 3: Risk Assessment and Vulnerability Analysis (Month 3-4)
Phase 4: Development of Security Enhancement Strategies (Month 5)
Phase 6: Monitoring and Continuous Improvement (Month 9 and ongoing)
kpis: Number of vulnerabilities identified and mitigated
Frequency of security training sessions conducted
risks: Resistance to change from staff or institutions
